Summary: It was like a huge tower floating over me.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking around at night with some friends when one of them spotted something. I looked up only to see this triangle shaped thing hovering over me about 1500 feet. I instantly got out my camera and zoomed in as much as i could to take the picture you see here. After about 2 hours it shot up in the sky blistering fast.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around June 21st 2009
